releases.release: Several enhancements: * Added `str2regexp()` function to `xslmod/general.mod.xsl` * Added URI decoding function to `xslmod/href.mod.xsl` * Added the option to get decoded URIs in `xpl3mod/recursive-directory-list/recursive-directory-list.xpl`
Fixed bug in creating canonical filenames on Unix
Added first XProc 3.0 support. Fixed some minor issues in templates.
Pre-release to test GitHub pages functionality

component-info.title: Common component: Shared libraries and IDE support
component-info.summary: `xtpxlib-common` is `xtpxlib`'s communal component. Most other `xtpxlib` components rely on it. It contains: * XSLT libraries, with functionality for handling parameters, manipulating filenames/URIs, MIME types, etc. * Parts of the functionality of the XSLT libraries are translated into XQuery. * XProc (1.0 and 3.0) steps, implementing things like recursive directory lists, creating ZIP files from directories, etc. * Templates (empty XSLT, XProc, XQuery, etc. files) for use in the oXygen IDE.
